verses.verse: How <S%H3302>beautiful<s%> are your <S%H6471>feet<s%> in <S%H5275>sandals,<s%> <S%H5081>prince<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter!<s%> Your <S%H2542>rounded<s%> <S%H3409>thighs<s%> are like <S%H2481>jewels,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of a skillful <S%H542>workman.<s%>

Your <S%H8326>body<s%> is like a <S%H5469>round<s%> <S%H101>goblet,<s%> no <S%H2637>mixed<s%> <S%H4197>wine<s%> is <S%H990>wanting.<s%> Your waist is like a <S%H6194>heap<s%> of <S%H2406>wheat,<s%> set <S%H5473>about<s%> with <S%H7799>lilies.<s%>
Your <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7699>breasts<s%> are like <S%H8147%H99999>two<s%> <S%H6646>fawns,<s%> that are twins of a <S%H8380>roe.<s%>

Your <S%H6677>neck<s%> is like an <S%H8127>ivory<s%> <S%H4026>tower.<s%> Your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are like the <S%H1295>pools<s%> in <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> by the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H1337>Bathrabbim.<s%> Your <S%H639>nose<s%> is like the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> which <S%H6822>looks<s%> <S%H6440>toward<s%> <S%H1834>Damascus.<s%>

Your <S%H7218>head<s%> on you is like <S%H3760>Carmel.<s%> The <S%H1803>hair<s%> of your <S%H7218>head<s%> like <S%H713>purple.<s%> The <S%H4428>king<s%> is <S%H631>held<s%> captive in its <S%H7298>tresses.<s%>
How <S%H3302>beautiful<s%> and how <S%H5276>pleasant<s%> you <S%H160>are,<s%> love, for <S%H8588>delights!<s%>
<S%H6967>This,<s%> your stature, is <S%H1819>like<s%> a palm <S%H8558>tree,<s%> your <S%H7699>breasts<s%> like its <S%H811>fruit.<s%>

I <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will climb <S%H5927>up<s%> into the palm <S%H8558>tree.<s%> I will take <S%H270>hold<s%> of its <S%H5577>fruit.<s%>" Let your <S%H7699>breasts<s%> be like <S%H811>clusters<s%> of the <S%H1612>vine,<s%> the <S%H7381>smell<s%> of your <S%H639>breath<s%> like <S%H8598>apples,<s%> Beloved

Your <S%H2441>mouth<s%> like the <S%H2896>best<s%> <S%H3196>wine,<s%> that <S%H1980>goes<s%> down <S%H4339>smoothly<s%> for my <S%H1730>beloved,<s%> <S%H1680>gliding<s%> through the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of those who are <S%H3463>asleep.<s%>
I am my <S%H1730>beloved<s%>'s. His desire is toward <S%H8669>me.<s%>
<S%H3212>Come,<s%> my <S%H1730>beloved,<s%> let us go <S%H3318>forth<s%> into the <S%H7704>field.<s%> Let us <S%H3885>lodge<s%> in the <S%H3723>villages.<s%>

<S%H7925>Let<s%>'s go early up to the <S%H3754>vineyards.<s%> <S%H7200>Let<s%>'s see whether the <S%H1612>vine<s%> has <S%H6524>budded,<s%> its <S%H6524>blossom<s%> is <S%H6605>open,<s%> and the <S%H7416>pomegranates<s%> are in <S%H5132>flower.<s%> There I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you my <S%H1730>love.<s%>

The <S%H1736>mandrakes<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> forth <S%H7381>fragrance.<s%> At our <S%H6607>doors<s%> are all kinds of <S%H4022>precious<s%> <S%H2319>fruits,<s%> new and <S%H3465>old,<s%> which I have stored <S%H6845>up<s%> for <S%H1730>you,<s%> my beloved.
